alert.note: Alert for Iredell; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 21 at 11:38AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Nuisance flooding of low-lying areas adjacent to streams within the N Second Creek watershed from Mount Ulla to Woodleaf. * WHERE...Portions of western Rowan County in North Carolina * WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Nuisance flooding of low-lying areas adjacent to streams and other poor-drainage areas, including farmland, parks, boat-access areas, golf courses, low-water crossings, and low-lying roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1133 AM EDT, High flows continue on N Second Creek and will continue through the day today. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Mooresville, Mount Ulla, and Woodleaf.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
